title: Australian football
creator_credit: Bruce Andrew, Australian Football Council and Herschells Films
brief_description: This film explains and demonstrates the following Australian rules terms: drop kick, punt kick, stab kick, place kick, highmarking, chest marking, hand ball, turning and baulking, tackling, ruck play, shepherding and blocking. Commentary by Eric Welch.
creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Andrew, Australian Football Council and Herschells Films
